subjectDescription: Discover a full suite of online business courses that will allow you to make better business decisions and succeed in today's competitive business world. Our courses provide a rich learning experience that will allow you to develop critical business skills in areas such as business... Read more...
title: Introduction to Entrepreneurship, Career Success and Digital Skills
headline: In this free online course, learn about the concepts and skills that are needed to become a successful entrepreneur.
description: This free online entrepreneurship course will introduce you to the concept of entrepreneurship and will teach you exactly what you need to know about business planning, generating a business idea and the benefits of entrepreneurship. Explore the practicalities of website development, basic principles of career success, the importance of soft skills when interacting with people as well as the principles of marketing and blogging.
courseDescription:
In this free online entrepreneurship certificate, you will learn about the fundamentals of entrepreneurship, such as how to become successful in your career, and the digitals skills that are helpful in today’s entrepreneurial market. The importance and limitations of entrepreneurship will be discovered as you go on a journey to learn about creativity, time management, the common mistakes that entrepreneurs make, how to avoid business pitfalls, and how to generate a business idea. It is fundamental to understand the environment that you are operating in as a business owner and the various topics also include analyzing the micro- and macro-environment. Practical skills are then discussed such as business management, -strategies and -communication and the all-important concept of marketing. 


Marketing is the most critical area to get right and connect with your potential customers and some basics you will learn are the marketing process, how to identify and evaluate marketing opportunities, how to do market research and segmentation of your target market along with the development of your unique marketing mix. Being successful in entrepreneurship requires technical skills but also a keen set of other skills such as diligence, devotion, determination, desire, discipline, active learning, problem solving, critical thinking, and time management, to mention a few. All of which are discussed in a practical, easy-to-understand way. Digital marketing is the next important topic which is extremely important to understand and master because of the age we live in today. The key themes you will study in this online entrepreneurship course include website development, Google Sites, HTML for various applications, and blogging fundamentals such as how to create a blog, the major uses of a blog, how to choose the right blogging platform, and identify the qualities of a successful blogger.

By the end of this course, you will have a strong understanding of the concept of entrepreneurship, career success, and modern digital skills to help you become a successful entrepreneur. Using business management, the internet and marketing fundamentals, you will learn how to set your business up and advertise your products and services to the right target audience using the right methods. If you are an aspiring entrepreneur who wants to become successful in your career, then you should seriously consider enrolling in this entrepreneurship education course that will take only three (3) hours of training.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • By the end of this module, you will be able to:
    • Define entrepreneur and entrepreneurship. 
    • List the benefits and limitations of entrepreneurship.
    • Explain how to generate a business idea.
    • Identify the basic principles of career success.
    • List the in-demand soft skills.
    • Discuss business environment.
    • Describe the principles of marketing.
    • Explain business planning.

  • Fundamentals of Entrepreneurship



  • Introduction

    Many scholars have defined entrepreneurship in their own ways. In this century, the definition for entrepreneurship is the act of exploring or identifying business opportunities for economic benefits. In this age, entrepreneurship is found to be far better than wage employment. 

    Computers have replaced human beings these days and many corporate bodies lay off many workers periodically due to the fact that few computers can perform the duties such workers do. One major difference between the poor and the rich is mindset; therefore, it is good to have a passion for entrepreneurship.

  • Select an Image from the Gallery

  • Marketing and Business Planning

  • Select an Image from the Gallery

  • Marketing

    Marketing is a major aspect of entrepreneurship. Every day, people buy products while others sell them. In order for buyers and sellers to meet, there must be a platform. The platform on which sellers and buyers of various goods and services do meet is known as market. Also, the act or process of satisfying people’s needs for income generation is known as marketing.

  • There are some processes that are involved in marketing, and they are:
    • Identification and evaluation of marketing opportunities
    • Development of marketing mix and management of the marketing efforts
    • Segmentation of the market
    • Identification of target markets

  • Marketing and Business Planning

  • Career Success

  • Select an Image from the Gallery

  • The Basic Principles of Career Success

    Success in one’s career is very important, and almost all individuals wish to attain success in their various careers. 

  • Though all individuals wish for success, it is not everyone that achieves success in his or her career. The reason may be to the fact that some people do not know, learn and/or follow the basic principles of career success. Truthfully, there is no way you will get any shortcut to career success. To succeed in your career you must work towards it.

    People who are excellent do go extra mile in order to reach the top of the ladder and remain there peacefully. Whenever you plan and determine to become successful in your career, you must pursue your desire with a solid determination, discipline, diligence, and devotion, and by so doing your success will never be denied and you will surely get to the top of the ladder. The following basic principles can help you attain success in your career.

  • Lesson Summary

    • Entrepreneurship is the act of exploring or identifying business opportunities for economic benefits. 
    • An entrepreneur is someone who identifies a business opportunity or organizes a business venture and assumes the risk for it.
    • Entrepreneurs bring positive changes to societies and the world. They also bring hope to mankind due to the fact that they are able to identify opportunities that others see as a threat. Entrepreneurs contribute highly to economic developments through job creation, innovation, leadership, and competitiveness, etc.
    • In order to achieve profit in a business, you must consider the business environment. The two main types of business environment are: (1). The micro environment (internal factors) such as bankers, distributors, suppliers, employees, consumers, and shareholders (2). The macro environment (external factors) such as competition, technology, social, economic, political, and natural/physical occurrences.
    • The ability to discover new ideas resulting in a very attractive and convenient ways to do things is known as creativity, and this can be developed and improved. Creativity is very important because every sector or business needs creative thinkers to discover new things for them. There are four steps in the process of creativity and they are knowledge accumulation, incubation process, idea experience, and implementation.

  • Learning Outcomes

  • By the end of this module, you will be able to:
    • Define Google Sites.
    • Explain the benefits and major uses of Google Sites.
    • Describe how to create a website using Google Sites.
    • Identify how HTML is used to create a website.
    • Analyze how to become successful in blogging.
    • Summarize how to create a blog.

  • Google Sites

  • Select an Image from the Gallery

  • Introduction

    The knowledge of website development is a good tool to have for entrepreneurs and all individuals. As technology is advancing, many people, organizations, and companies, to mention a few, are using websites to conduct their businesses and other activities online. This clearly shows that having a website is very important in all aspects of human life in this modern world.

  • It is very expensive to create, manage, and maintain a website if you are not an IT professional. Google Sites is a simple yet powerful platform (website creation tool or website builder) that is used to create a very secure and professional-looking websites for various purposes without any programming or coding skills.

  • Hypertext Markup Language (HTML)

  • As an entrepreneur, you can also use HTML to create your website if you do not like website builders such as Google Sites and the like. Web Page, World Wide Web, and Internet, are not just buzzwords, but rather real words. When you hear the term Network of Networks, it refers to the Internet, the largest computer network in the world. The World Wide Web (WWW) is one subset of the internet and it contains many web servers that have been scattered across the world, and anyone from anywhere in the world can access the information that the web servers contain.

  • Select an Image from the Gallery


  • The information that the web servers contain is available in the form of web pages, and every website contains a collection of many interlinked web pages on the World Wide Web. In this course, you will learn about Hypertext Markup Language (HTML), which is a very important component in website or web page development/designing.

  • Lesson Summary

    • The knowledge of website development is good for entrepreneurs and all individuals. As technology is advancing, many people, organizations, and companies, to mention a few, are using websites to conduct their businesses and other activities online. This clearly shows that having a website is very important in all aspects of human life in this modern world.
    • Google Sites can be used to create a business (public-facing) website. If you own a business or you are planning to establish a business, you can use Google Sites to create a website for your business or company. Having a business website is very important to reach more customers and to demonstrate your goods or services to the world. With the knowledge of Google Sites, you can create your business website for free.
    • Google Sites offers a free Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate. As there are many issues with using unsecure websites, it is very essential to make sure that a website provides safe communications. SSL certificate ensures the security of a website, and Google provides a free SSL certificate when you create a website using Google Sites.
    • Google Docs, Google Sheets, and Google Forms are very useful online Google Apps for personal and organizational uses. By using Google Sites as your website builder you can integrate them into your website for their amazing benefits.

  • Lesson Summary

This clearly shows that having a website is very important in all aspects of human life in this modern world.
    • Google Sites can be used to create a business (public-facing) website. If you own a business or you are planning to establish a business, you can use Google Sites to create a website for your business or company. Having a business website is very important to reach more customers and to demonstrate your goods or services to the world. With the knowledge of Google Sites, you can create your business website for free.
    • Google Sites offers a free Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate. SSL certificate ensures the security of a website, and Google provides a free SSL certificate when you create a website using Google Sites.
    • Google Docs, Google Sheets, and Google Forms are very useful online Google Apps for personal and organizational uses. By using Google Sites as your website builder you can integrate them into your website for their amazing benefits.

This clearly shows that having a website is very important in all aspects of human life in this modern world.
    • Google Sites can be used to create a business (public-facing) website. If you own a business or you are planning to establish a business, you can use Google Sites to create a website for your business or company. Having a business website is very important to reach more customers and to demonstrate your goods or services to the world. With the knowledge of Google Sites, you can create your business website for free.
    • Google Sites offers a free Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate. As there are many issues with using unsecure websites, it is very essential to make sure that a website provides safe communications. SSL certificate ensures the security of a website, and Google provides a free SSL certificate when you create a website using Google Sites.
    • Google Docs, Google Sheets, and Google Forms are very useful online Google Apps for personal and organizational uses. By using Google Sites as your website builder you can integrate them into your website for their amazing benefits.
